manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ultra soft facial tissues Bulk Facial Tissue, Made Plastic-Free These cylinder tubes are filled with tree-free tissues made of bamboo. Instead of chopping down old-growth forests, we transform the fastest growing grass in the world (bamboo) into strong and soft facial tissues. These round canisters dispense one tissue at a time. Look closely at each of the fun, kid-friendly designs and you'll notice they each have an explosive quality! The tissue exits the tube and becomes a part of the creative design. You'll find that kids of all ages will enjoy playing with the tubes, displaying them in their room and using the tissue. So whether teaching them about hygiene or caring for their little noses, you'll find that these will be the facial tissue kiddos request again and again!

Certifiably Awesome soft on you and the earth We work with the best third-party groups in our industry to assure our products are as soft on you as they are on the earth. Crazy facts about toilet paper according to the NRDC: * Did you know that 27,000 trees are flushed down the toilet everyday in the USA? * Toilet paper accounts for 15% of deforestation globally * The average 2-person household can save 1 tree a year by switching to tree-free Bim Bam Boo paper Bim Bam Boo is USDA certified (2022), IS0 9000 (2019) certified and carries an official FSC label (2019).

Totally Terrific Facial Tissue hypo-allergenic Developed from bamboo, our tissues are made for the most sensitive skin, free from irritants and major allergens. Perfect for all of life’s messes! chlorine free Choosing Bim Bam Boo’s trusted chlorine-free formula is a great way to ensure your skin happy! Instead of chlorine, we whiten our products with hydrogen peroxide. It's a more gentle approach that is less irritating to your skin...and softer on the earth too! pure & dust-free No more linty-leave behinds or dusty particles! Due to bamboo's long fiber structure, our super-strong formula keeps our soft facial tissue intact without pesky fly aways.

kid-friendly tissue in plastic-free designs Bim Bam Boo's bamboo tissue is totally tubular Why is bamboo better? Bamboo grows fast! It takes 30 years for a tree to grow, while it only takes 2 years for bamboo to grow. No harsh chemicals Non-toxic and gentle! Tree-based paper may contain irritating chemicals like bleach. Cruelty-free & Vegan Made without any animal-derived ingredients or coatings.

Women-Owned, Impact Driven Support a small business with your purchase We truly care about every single customer's experience. As a small, women-owned company — your purchase truly makes a difference in supporting diversity and change. Thanks for choosing to make a difference with your purchase for the earth, and for equity! Women Owned Bim Bam Boo is a WBENC-Certified WBE from the Women’s Business Enterprise National Council (2023).

Toilet Paper, Lilac 12 Pack The Household Bundle Toilet Paper, 24 Pack Wet Wipes, 8 Pack Facial Tissue, 6 Pack What's Included 12 rolls of toilet paper 1 pack of 12 roll toilet paper, 1 pack of 2 tree-free towels, 1 box of ultra-soft facial tissues, 1 emergency roll (just in case!) 24 rolls of toilet paper 8 Packs of Wet Wipes 6 boxes of Facial Tissue Ply 2-ply 2-ply toilet paper, 3-ply tissues 2-ply 3-ply Plant-Based ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ BPA Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Chlorine Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Septic Safe ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Cruelty Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Eco friendly and fits in cup holder!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars New Tissue Paper
reviews.reviewText: This new tissue paper that is coming in a beautiful jar/ container is good because it’s made of Bamboo and also takes a little room around the place but I wish it would hold more than fifty in the container.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Little Noses
reviews.reviewText: These facial tissues are amazing! They are super soft and gentle on the skin, making them perfect for kids. They are also very absorbent, so they are great for little noses. Additionally, they have a delightful, tubular shape that children will adore. Bim Bam Boo Kids Tubular facial tissues are highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute tube box!
reviews.reviewText: The unicorn tube box is so cute and my 18mo year old daughter enjoyed looking at the unicorns. The tissue itself isn’t as soft as we were hoping. But it still got he job done!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are too small to be used for any part of your body. Useless!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for kids in the car
reviews.reviewText: Love these so much! Cute designs for kids. They fit perfectly in the cup holders or side pocket so no more smashed tissue boxes on the floor, if you know what I’m talking about. I also love that the tissue does not leave lint so they are perfect for cleaning glasses, sunglasses, mirrors, phones, etc…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My already raw and sniffly nose wanted to care about the environment, but these things took off skin! So rough. Put these in a guest room when you don't really want your guest to stay too long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Cup Holder Tissues there is
reviews.reviewText: I am very impressed with the size of this tube type of tissues. So soft for my eyes and nose. I will buy this product again without hesitation. Yes, I would recommend this to family and friends.
